samples.question: Like what kind of items?
samples.transcript: Like use it twice. Yeah, I mean I try to stay away from disposable stuff because you use them, you throw it away and it is not, the quality of it is not really designed to be used a second time or multiple times. So I, for example, chopsticks and bowls and things, I tend to want to use, actual, plates and bowls so that I do not have to use disposable. And so I can clean them up and I do not have to waste all these things. And also I think a lot of, big companies such as, Coca-Cola and even BA companies, they have started to do these recycling things where you finish the bottle and you can, give it back to the company for a little bit. Back to the company for a little bit of money back. And I think it does encourage people to recycle things instead of throwing it everywhere and not using it after once. No major problems here. I think he spoke at length about this particular topic, why people recycle, what his feelings about recycling are. He prefers not to use disposable items. there is a good word for you. Disposable. He prefers not to. He talked about sustainability and it encourages people. I strongly advise you go and listen to some of his language. He did really well here. I am going to give you a topic and I would like you to talk about it for one to two minutes.

samples.question: Is globalization changing our traditions?
samples.transcript: For sure. I think globalization does not necessarily mean that we have to change the way we are. We have to embrace other cultures for sure, but it does not mean that we have to accommodate. Oh, we, we, we have to accommodate to other cultures, but it does not mean that other cultures have to change. Like it does not mean all cultures have to come together and only becomes a universal one.
samples.transcript_original: Um, for sure. I think globalization doesn't necessarily mean that we have to change the way we are. samples.question: Do you have favorite subject in mind?

samples.question: What do you usually do after school?

samples.question: And can you tell me the differences between feeling tired after school and feeling tired after playing sport?

Okay, very well. And that will conclude our speaking test.

samples.question: So, are you a student or are you working?
